header.title: Settings
home.description: Manage your account, privacy, and security to enhance your {{productName}} experience.
home.setup.title: Setup
home.setup.footerLinkText: Log in to Mozilla & Ablaze Account
home.setup.setupDescription: Complete the setup to maximize your {{productName}} experience.
home.privacyAndTrackingProtection.title: Privacy and Tracking Protection
home.privacyAndTrackingProtection.descri: {{productName}} protects your data and privacy by default, but you can also manage these settings manually.
home.ablazeAccount.title: Ablaze Account (Coming Soon)
home.ablazeAccount.description: Use Mozilla Account to sync some data with other devices. Ablaze Account syncs data that can't be synced with a Mozilla Account.
home.manageExtensions.title: Manage Extensions
home.manageExtensions.description: {{productName}} allows you to manage extensions available on addons.mozilla.org.
home.browserSupport.title: {{productName}} Support
home.browserSupport.description: Access support documentation written by {{productName}} contributors.
design.customizePositionOfToolbars: Customize toolbar positions, tab bar style, and {{productName}}'s appearance.
design.advancedLeptonThemeSettingsDescri: The selected theme uses Lepton design. Additional customization options are available.
design.interfaceDescription: Choose the interface design. "Lepton" is the default.
design.useFaviconColorToBackgroundOfNavi: Use Favicon Color for Navigation Bar Background
design.verticalTabIsRemovedFromBrowser: Vertical Tab has been removed from {{productName}}. Please use Firefox's native Vertical Tab Bar instead.
design.showTabBarOnBottomOfNavigationBar: Show Tab Bar at Bottom of Navigation Bar
design.showTabBarOnBottomOfWindow: Show Tab Bar at Bottom of Window
design.tab.title: Tabs
design.tab.scrollDescription: Choose whether to use scrolling for tab switching and select scrolling behavior.
design.tab.scrollPrefInfo: "{{reverseScrollPrefName}}" & "{{scrollWrapPrefName}}" will only work if "{{scrollPrefName}}" is enabled.
design.tab.openPositionDescription: Specify where new tabs open. Following Firefox's behavior will vary the position based on how you open links.
design.tab.openLast: Open at the end of the tab bar
design.tab.openNext: Open next to the current tab
about.browserDescription: {{productName}} is a domestically developed browser in Japan. It's built on Firefox under Ablaze to improve the web.
about.openSourceLicense: {{productName}} is open-source software available under the Mozilla Public License 2.0, made possible by the Firefox open-source project and other open-source software.
search.searchResultsDescription: Search results for "{{query}}". Only {{productName}} settings are searched; Firefox settings are not included.
